attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned believe that there is a business case for High Speed Rail in the UK, and that the construction stimulus to the economy is quite a good idea in these times of austerity.
We want the Government to start HS2.  Every other country can build a High Speed line in 3 to 5 years, and it is quite pathetic that the UK needs 15++ years to get the job done.

rejection.details: The petition is not specific as to what action the Government is being asked to take; is it calling for a specific time frame within which HS2 should be commenced?
